summary: A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.

keywords: drugs|heroin|night life|dying young|west berlin west germany
title: Yo, Cristina F
